author: nicolas
msg: plexus lifecycle handling moved to a BeanPostProcessor
BeanPostProcessor and PlexusContainerAdapter automatically registered in the ApplicationContext
fall back to ConsoleLoggerManager when no LoggerManager bean found
!!! archiva-proxy tests now pass as PlexusInSpringTests !!!

author: lhein
msg: - changed the getAttachment(String id) method to behave JBI compliant (see SM-1186 by Alex Vidgor)
- added a testcase for this issue

author: kmarsden
msg: Removed piece of this test that is machine/jvm/thread timing dependent on
Filed a new issue DERBY-1213, to rewrite this testing in a more reproducible

author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-3465: Removed a number of try-catch clauses that caught exceptions and printed a generic message without any information about the exception itself.
